subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Toronto Raptors named Maurizio Gherardini, general manager of the Italian club Benetton Treviso, as vice president and assistant general manager yesterday. The appointment of Gherardini is a strong indication that the Raptors may select Andrea Bargnani, a center for Benetton Treviso, with the No. 1 overall pick in Wednesday's N.B.A. draft.
